name: First Place Gambler
description:
First Place Gambling is a retro-based gambling game about betting on randomized stick figures running foot races across six different tracks to pay back your debt.

Race stats:

SPD (Speed): The speed at which the runner moves at the beginning of the race.

END (Endurance): The chance that at any point during a race, the runner will lose speed.

CHK (Choke factor): The chance that on the final lap of a race, the runner will significantly lose speed.

Objective:

The objective of the game is to pay off your $5,000 debt, working your way up with your starting cash of $15.

I made a video about the creation of the game development process from beginning to end, check it out:
